Summary I have over 27 years of experience in Quality Assurance ranging from larger companies to startups. I have managed UAT teams of up to 80 people. QA groups up to 12 and offshore teams located in India of up to 15. I understand how to manage offshore teams and how to deal with the risks and potential hurdles. 
In my experience I have built 3 QA departments from the ground up at various startups by bringing in structure into a chaos environment. This included helping develop functional specs, BRD and test plans and test cases. Introducing new tools like bug tracking systems , automation tools and virtual OS like VM ware.  
I have developed test plans for many shrink wrap, hardware and web based applications. This also includes social media apps and ecommerce. Used various tools like Quality Center to develop, log and track test cases through many test cycles. I have a understanding of Waterfall Test Cycles and experience with Agile & Extreme programming as it relates to the SDLC. 
If you have any questions feel free to contact me at your leisure.
